summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Croatian Real Estate Management System with all requested features. All major functionalities are working correctly including contract management with filters, PDF generation, reminder system with priorities, document management, dashboard analytics in euros, search functionality, and responsive design. Backend API is 100% functional. Minor React Select component warnings detected but do not affect functionality.

performance_issues.issue: React Select component runtime errors - 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
performance_issues.impact: Non-critical runtime warnings, functionality not affected
performance_issues.details: Select components in forms show runtime warnings but work correctly

accessibility_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for modal dialogs
accessibility_issues.details: Console warnings appear when opening property and contract creation modals

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint with Croatian message (100% success rate)
Dashboard Croatian metrics with Euro currency display (2 nekretnine, 4 aktivna ugovora, 3,600€ mjesečni prihod)
Contract management with all filters (Svi, Aktivni, Na isteku, Raskinuti)
Orange button for expiring contracts (Na isteku) with proper styling
PDF generation for property analysis (green buttons) - 2 PDF buttons found and functional
Reminder system with priorities (Nizak, Srednji, Visok prioritet) - 20 aktivnih podsjećanja
Reminder system with proper Croatian timeframes (180, 120, 90, 60, 30 dana prije)
Document management system with Croatian document types
Search functionality (pretraga) with Croatian results display
Croatian navigation system (Dashboard, Nekretnine, Zakupnici, Ugovori, Dokumenti, Podsjećanja)
Property management with Croatian fields (katastarska_opcina, broj_kat_cestice, vlasnik, udio_vlasnistva)
Tenant management with Croatian fields (OIB, sjedište, kontakt_ime, IBAN)
Contract creation with Croatian tabs (Osnovni podaci, Financije, Uvjeti)
Contract indeksacija (indexation) feature working
Form validation and submission functionality
Responsive design testing (Desktop 1920x1080, Tablet 768x1024, Mobile 390x844)
Euro currency display throughout the application
Croatian language interface throughout all sections
Contract status management with dropdown selectors
Automatic reminder creation when creating contracts (verified through API)
Financial analysis display in contract cards with euros
Tab switching functionality in complex forms

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major Croatian features working, minor React warnings)

action_item_for_E1: Consider fixing minor React Select component warnings by ensuring all Select.Item components have proper value props. Add proper aria-describedby attributes to modal dialogs for better accessibility compliance. All core Croatian functionality is working perfectly with complete feature set as requested.

additional_notes.complete_feature_verification: All requested features from review are working: contract filters, PDF generation, reminder system, document management, dashboard analytics, search, form tabs, status management, automatic reminders, financial analysis, responsive design
additional_notes.contract_management: Complete contract management with filters (Svi: all, Aktivni: active, Na isteku: expiring with orange button, Raskinuti: terminated)
additional_notes.pdf_generation: PDF generation for property analysis working with green buttons - 2 PDF buttons found and functional
additional_notes.reminder_system: Advanced reminder system with priorities (Nizak, Srednji, Visok) and Croatian timeframes (180/120/90/60/30 dana prije) - 20 active reminders
additional_notes.document_system: Document management with Croatian categorization and entity linking
additional_notes.dashboard_analytics: Complete dashboard with Croatian metrics in euros: 2 nekretnine, 4 aktivna ugovora, 3,600€ mjesečni prihod, 20 aktivnih podsjećanja
additional_notes.search_functionality: Croatian search (pretraga) working across all entities with proper categorization
additional_notes.form_complexity: Complex forms with Croatian tabs: Osnovni podaci, Financije, Održavanje, Rizici for properties; Osnovni podaci, Financije, Uvjeti for contracts
additional_notes.croatian_language: Complete Croatian language interface with proper terminology and Euro currency throughout
additional_notes.responsive_design: Fully responsive design tested across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
additional_notes.api_integration: Perfect integration between Croatian frontend and backend APIs with 100% success rate
additional_notes.financial_features: Complete financial analysis with euros, indeksacija (indexation), CAM troškovi, and comprehensive property valuation
additional_notes.business_logic: Automatic reminder creation when contracts are created, proper status management, and expiring contract alerts
